pages.text: An assortment of music discs featuring note block renditions of popular songs from the Kamen Rider Series.
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - Let's Go!! Rider Kick$(br2)Based on:$(li)Hiroshi Fujioka/Koichi Fuji - Let's Go!! Rider Kick$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider (1971, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - Kamen Rider Black$(br2)Based on:$(li)Tetsuo Kurata - Kamen Rider Black$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Black (1987, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - Alive A life$(br2)Based on:$(li)Rica Matsumoto - Alive A life$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - Justiφ's$(br2)Based on:$(li)ISSA - Justiφ's$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider 555 (2003, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - EXCITE$(br2)Based on:$(li)Daichi Miura - EXCITE$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - Be The One$(br2)Based on:$(li)PANDORA feat. Beverly - Be The One$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - REAL×EYEZ$(br2)Based on:$(li)J×Takanori Nishikawa - REAL×EYEZ$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)
Song:$(li)HosephHoestar - Masked Rider$(br2)Based on:$(li)Idk you figure it out$(br)Type:$(li)Opening theme (OP)$(br)Appears in:$(li)[REDACTED]
